2:
Hide me from the secret plotting of evildoers,
\q from the commotion of the doers of iniquity.
4:
so that they may shoot from secret places at someone who is innocent;
\q suddenly they shoot at him and fear nothing.
9:
All people will fear
\q and will declare God's deeds.
\q They will wisely think about what he has done.
10:
The righteous will be glad about Yahweh and will take refuge in him;
\q all the upright in heart will take pride in him.
64:
\m
\d For the chief musician. A psalm of David.
\q
